question: The death anniversary of which leader is observed as Samarpan Diwas?
explanation:
The death anniversary of Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhyay â€“ 11th February, was recently observed as Samarpan Diwas.
He was the co-founder of the Bharatiya Jana Sangh and the was forerunner of BJP. During the pre-independence time, he started a monthly publication named Rashtra Dharma. He was assassinated on 11th February 1968.
